Translations.Text: O popol vi est unu bezon DI while DI est en ne bezon anyone plej Praiseworthy
Li vol Li get rid da vi substitute neo creation
This ne est tro difficult por DI

Ne anim port pek another anim. Anim loaded pek implores another bor part de its load neni ali anim port any part de gxi ecx ili rilat! Nur popol heed your warnings est those reverence their Lord eben when sol en their privacy observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! Whoever purifies his anim does tial his own bon Al DI est final destiny
Nor est coolness de shade hejt sun
Nor est viv dead DI kauxz whomever Li vol auxd. Vi ne far hearers those graves
Vi est ne plur than warner
Ni send vi truth bearer bon news tro warner. Cxiu community ricev warner
Se ili disbelieve vi those antaux them ankaux disbelieved Their messengers ir them klar proofs Psalm enlightening scriptures
Subsequently mi pun those disbelieved kiel terrible est My retribution
